title: I find it hilarious when people assume that champion winrate means everything.
body:
I was a Aatrox one trick in season 4 (this is when he was complete dog shit) and had a 63% win rate on him and climb to diamond 4 just by playing him, even though he has a 44% winrate overall. Same thing goes for heimer mains, a champion that is considered niche and unplayable, his winrate is higher than anyone elses right now, at 54% and Quinn at 53%. Irelia is broken as all fuck right now, but still remains at a 50% winrate barely.

So stop trying to make this argument with me, it's really annoying.
